Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan captain Babar Azam spoke about Imad Wasim not being available for the opening match against the United States of America due to a side strain.
Babar expects Imad Wasim to be fit for the remaining matches against India, Ireland, and Canada or if they qualify for the next stages of the tournament.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan will start their 2024 T20 tournament against the United States of America at Dallas, Texas on 6th June before they face arch-rivals India on 9th June in New York.
The USA began the World Cup chasing down 195 against Canada in Dallas.
Others: Imad Wasim looked impressive with both bat and ball during the recently concluded PSL for Karachi Kings.
Pakistan needs to depend upon Haris Rauf, Shaheen Shah Afridi, Naseem Shah, and Abbas Afridi.
Shadab Khan’s poor form will be a major concern while Abrar Ahmed’s lack of experience in international cricket might hurt them big time.
Iftikhar Ahmed will be part spin option who can bowl a few overs if the regular bowlers go for runs.
